source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_00<tab>Hihibaru has information that will <var 1A 02 /var>surely<var 1A 01 /var> lead you to Lahabrea.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_00<tab>ハイブリッジの商人ヒヒバルは、仮面の男について決定的な情報を思い出したようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_01<tab>Hihibaru claims to have witnessed a masked man meeting his beastman accomplices in secret. Make your way to the ash-covered ground northeast of Highbridge, and use a smoldering coal to arrange a similar rendezvous.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_01<tab>仮面の男らしき人物が、狼煙を使って蛮族とやり取りをしていたらしい。ハイブリッジの北東の「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E8C2D01 /var>」で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86DC01 /var>」を使い、敵をおびきだしてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_02<tab>The smoldering coal gives rise to a column of smoke, which serves to summon a bandit. Forced to defend yourself, you slay the man and find upon his corpse a peculiar scroll bearing the mark of Rhalgr, the Destroyer. Return to Highbridge and present your find to Hihibaru.
target: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F207CD01 /var>を討伐したところ、「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E882701 /var>」を入手した。ハイブリッジの商人「ヒヒバル」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_03<tab>It would seem that Lahabrea has clandestine connections not only with the Qiqirn, but also the Ala Mhigans. Your investigation begins to unfold, and where it may lead is anyone's guess...
target: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SEQ_03<tab>どうやら仮面の男は、キキルン族だけでなくアラミゴ人とも影でつながっているらしい。仮面の男の調査はまだまだ続きそうだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_TODO_00<tab>Use the smoldering coal at the specified location.
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_TODO_01<tab>Present the ward of the Destroyer to Hihibaru.
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_SYSTEM_100_000受注するには、進行中のメインクエストを破棄する必要があります。
メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」から、
「ジャーナル」を選び、破棄してください。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_000<tab>I've finally got some honest-to-gods information on your masked man! Why so confident? Because I <var 1A 02 /var>saw<var 1A 01 /var> him with my own two eyes!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_000それにしても「仮面の男」ねえ……はっ！
あんたさんが探している「仮面の男」について、
いい情報を思い出しました！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_001<tab>I was out for an evening stroll, minding my own business, when I noticed a column of smoke rising from a cliff over at Thal's Respite. Curious, I took myself there to find a masked man─<var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> masked man, I'm sure of it─standing by a fire.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_001これは間違いない情報ですよ！？
何せ、私もこの目で見たんですから！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_002<tab>As if in answer, some Qiqirn appeared soon after, and the group began talking at length. I'm afraid I was too far out of earshot to hear much of anything.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_002その男はね「ザルの祠」あたりの崖で、
「狼煙」を使って、蛮族とやり取りしていたんです。
さすがに、その内容まではわかりませんでしたが……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_003<tab>After the group had dispersed, an idea came to me: if you were to use this smoldering coal to start a fire, you might be able to arrange a similar meeting. It will be dangerous, I shouldn't doubt, but you've proven yourself more than a match for a pack of rats.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_003そこで、ちょっと閃いたのですよ！
「仮面の男」みたいに、この「」で狼煙を上げれば、
男と繋がりのある奴をおびき出せるんじゃないかってね！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_004<tab>So, what do you think? That's some sound, reliable information, even if I do say so myself. Well worth all the lingering about you've been doing, wouldn't you say?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_004どうです、いい情報でしょう！？
……で、ご相談なんですがね。
これが終わったら、しばらくここにご逗留ってことは……。
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_DUMMYTODO_000_010<tab>指定地点(丘の上)で「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E86DC01 /var>」を使い、ポップした盗賊(アラミゴ人)を倒す

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_020<tab>Back so soon? Were you able to find any clues leading to your masked man?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_020帰ってきましたか、冒険者さん。
探し人……「仮面の男」の手がかりは掴めましたか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_030<tab><gasp> Th-This scroll! It bears a prayer to Rhalgr, the Destroyer!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_030これは……いや、間違いない。
冒険者さん、こいつは「壊神ラールガー」の神符ですよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_031<tab>In case you're unfamiliar, Rhalgr is the guardian deity of Ala Mhigo, which is currently under Garlean rule.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_031「壊神ラールガー」ってのは、
帝国に占領された都市「アラミゴ」の守護神でしてね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_032<tab>It's <var 1A 02 /var>highly<var 1A 01 /var> uncommon for folk of other nations to revere Him. I'd wager my last gil that your assailant was Ala Mhigan.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_032その神符となりゃぁ、愛国心の強いアラミゴ人なら、
まず間違いなく持っているはずです。

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_033<tab>It seems this masked man of yours is very well connected. I must confess, the merchant in me envies such a diverse network of contacts.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_033そんなものを持った奴が取引に現れたってことは、
「仮面の男」は蛮族どころか、アラミゴ人とも
繋がりがあるってことなんですかねぇ……？

source: TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_034<tab>That selfsame merchant also senses danger ahead...and darkness besides. Are you certain you'd rather not take things nice and slow here at Highbridge?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSA504_00756_HIHIBARU_000_034……どちらにしても、お気をつけを。
あんたさんの探し人は、かなり厄介な奴のようですよ。
